sentences: In the decision (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.30/Add.1), the COP, inter alia: requests the Secretariat to develop a compilation and accounting database in coordination with the development of the international transaction log (ITL) and to report progress to SBSTA; and to consult with administrators of registry systems to facilitate the review of national inventories and assigned amount information under Protocol Article 8.
The decision also includes a draft decision on the same issue to be presented to COP/MOP-1 for consideration.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
